project.title: ICpEP.SE USTP Website
project.description: An organizational website for the Institute of Computer Engineers of the Philippines Student Edition (ICpEP.SE) USTP.
project.solution: The goal of the design is to offer ICpEP.SE a comprehensive platform to share what their organization is about and connect with their constituents. The website itself is structured in a way that allows visitors the opportunity to truly get to know ICpEP.SE, with contents about their aspirations and student involvement. The website also boasts a dedicated blog page that ensures visitors are up-to-date with events of the org and other related news.
project.challenge: The ICpEP.SE is the official student body of the Department of Computer Engineering in USTP-CDO. For years, most of their communications are facilitated through social media. A dedicated organizational website would be a nice addition to increase their online presence and establish their credibility as a legitimate student organization. With their own website, the ICpEP.SE can have a platform to showcase relevant contents to the CpE students.
